column4: Greetings, can Fluxbox run without GNOME? I'm using GNOME right now, and I'm thinking of changing. Also, if Fluxbox only runs with GNOME, then how is it faster? :/
Greetings, can Fluxbox run without GNOME? I'm using GNOME right now, and I'm thinking of changing. Also, if Fluxbox only runs with GNOME, then how is it faster? :/
